content.detailedDescription: Getting ready to go into my car, i was standing on our front porch, just happen to look up, there was a saucer shape object not moving just above the tree top got a very clear look i could tell easily what it was.  went to work did not tell anyone till just now, i would be glad to talk to anyone about this at that time i was 22 years old with one child.  i thank zyou, lawrence....
content.summary: Size of a plate very large , no noise, silver color some lights not blinking, above the tree tops. clear morning, a very good look at it for five minutes!!!

content.detailedDescription: Me and a friend went outside. we where talking and i heard a airplane flying. i looked at the small airplane flying east to west when at the same time i noticed a silver sphere flying in front of the airplane in the same direction at the same speed. the ball looked higher up than the airplane and quiet a bit bigger. it looked very shiny and reflective. we didn't know what to make of it. my wife was inside playing a video game and later told me the tv got unclear with waving lines and static. i wanted to get her outside to look but just couldn't take my eyes off the sphere. i few minutes later it had flown out of sight behind the tree line. i wish we would have asked the local airport about it and reported it before now.
content.summary: Silver ball which seemed to have a small airplane tailing it

content.detailedDescription: I was watching tv late one evening. i lived in a very isolated farm area with no visible neighbors. i noticed lights out my window which appeared to be on a brush covered hill. i thought it was a truck off roading and watched for a bit. it didn't move so i stepped outside to get a better look. it was a triangular shape with a y of white lights and various colored lights towards the edges. it was clearly not a truck so i guessed it was an airplane.  it was strange looking so i kept staring at it to confirm it was a plane by seeing it pass by. it just seemed to be stationary so i went and grabbed binoculars. i clearly saw the triangular shape and it seemed to be about 30 feet off the ground about half a mile away. i still thought it was just a plane coming straight towards me so it appeared to be hovering.  the size of the triangle didn't change and after 30 minutes it clearly wasn't an airplane. i felt scared and it kinda seemed to be observing me since there aren't any other homes near by. i turned and talked with my mother a bit then looked back and it was gone, nowhere in the sky. i clearly saw something hovering about 30 feet off the ground that had an unusual series of lights that disappeared in an instant.  i have shared this with a few people but i don't really like to talk about it. i believe it was something beyond current man's ability.
content.summary: Triangular shape with a y of whites lights in the middle and colored lights towards the edges. hovered for about 30 minute the instantly disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
I was pregnant and sleeping next to my (then) husband.  i awoke to find several people walking through out room and the wall at the head of the bed was transparent.  in the back yard was a disc shaped object hovering over the yard and several of our neighbors were walking to it in a dream-like state.  i asked my husband if he was seeing any of it and he said yes and covered his head with a blanket and refused to acknowledge it any further.  an older man from down the street was in our room and i asked him what was happening. he said, "they're hear to take us...Aren't you coming?"  i said i was not coming and he went through the wall and to the yard.  just then the beam of light from the disc went out and the object ascended into the night sky and disappeared.  i passed out and awoke in the morning, remembering everything.  my husband refused to talk about it and still will not admit it happened.
this is only one of many instances.
content.summary: Approximately 20-30 ft across, disc shaped, lit up, glowing, emitting a beam of light beneath

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from work, and in the distance i saw red light. it suddenly dawned on me that there were no towers in that area. i was on the phone to my sister  and as i got close to town, i could make out that it wasn't a tower, but a craft in the air. i told my sister that i think i was looking at a ufo! she told me to go home and go to bed. at this point, it wasn't moving, but as i went under it, it began moving south. there was a red light in the center and two white lights on two of the corners, but the corner in the front had no light. i checked the newspapers for days after that and of course saw nothing. i was northbound at the time and it was dark out, so i didn't see it very long....Just long enough to change my life.
content.summary: The craft was hovering, south of town, slowly went south.

content.detailedDescription:
Smoking  a cigarette. 
the fact  that  it was moving with no cars around  and the night sky no lights easy to see it move.
i was just  kept my eye on it i hadn't  really  seen anything  like  it  before. 
it just stayed  stationery  for about a min the took off fast . 
reaction hmm i'm going to  report it.
it flew over my apartment .
content.summary: Triangle  of star like lights hovered over layton before  racing off 30 sec to 2 min.

content.detailedDescription:
1. an early morning walk with my father.
2. both my father and i looked up at the same time and saw the object...
3. a ufo
4. it appeared as a red light in the distance relative size to a star of four times, but was far away, so obviously it was much larger, maybe the size of a fighter jet.
5. my father and i were excited and laughed about seeing a ufo...
6. it took off incredibly fast, faster than any man mad aircraft by far and disappeared in less than one second into the sky.
content.summary: Hovered for about one minute then took off at an incredible speed up and away

content.detailedDescription: I was on my way towards mankato (sw of eagle lake on mn hwy 14) when i saw an orange lit orb triangle shaped object about 50 to 70 ft hovering above local radio station (mn 93 country radio station between mankato & eagle lake near roundabout on 14. i pulled over to the side of the road to try and take a photo but by the time i had gotten out of my vehicle the object was gone.
content.summary: Small orb like triangle, with orange lit lighting (no sound)

content.detailedDescription: Sitting outside stargazingserving. when we noticed the object over grapevine lake thought it was a weather balloon then shut off to the east in a flash.
content.summary: Asended over lake. then shot off to the east in a flash. thought it was a weather ballon.

content.detailedDescription: Glowing neon green cube that seemed to spin on its corner flew over my house/neighborhood
content.summary: Neon green cube that spun and on its side and rotated

content.detailedDescription: I was at a friends house outside on his front porch talking and smoking a cigarette with him at about 9pm on a night in february. it was a calm night with the sky being overcast. because he lived in a built up area (a housing estate) the sky was cast in a dull orange glow from all of the street lights. my friend first noticed the object and immediately alerted me to it. at first i thought it was just a balloon but the object was much larger. it's appearance was a perfect matt black sphere with a very crisp solid outline to discern that it wasn't fluttering or changing shape as a black trash bag might do if caught in the wind. it's size about that of a pea at arms length, was flying at a height of approximately 40 metres, although this was hard to determine due to lack of perspectives of the object, and was travelling in a south westerly direction. it had no lights, emitted no sound and maintained a straight consistent direction of travel slightly decending. we observed the object for as long as we could even running down the street to try and prolong our viewing until we eventually lost sight of it because of roof tops and trees. after losing site of the object me and my friend had feelings of confusion as to what we had just seen. i had the feeling of pins and needles throughout my body as did my friend as neither of us had experienced such a weird phenomenon before. unfortunately neither myself or my friend managed to get and photo or video evidence of what we saw as we were to engrossed in trying to prolong our viewing of the object. this entire sighting lasted less than a minute but has remained with us since.
content.summary: Perfect matt black sphere flying in straight direction.

content.altitude: Landed, Treetop, 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover), Unknown
content.detailedDescription:
Followed object that appeared to be the celestial sun, was then constantly followed by other / extra dimensional beings, who took fluid samples from my body, as well as medication and other places from my residentiary. force me to use words that do not exist by order to find a way to defeat familiarity in the universe, as we have discovered that the universe has not changed, and keeps crunching and reexpanding in exactly the same way and manner and station.

beings are 7th dimensional or higher, can pass through matter / mass without leaving injury or human observable evidence that they remained.
content.distance: 20 Feet or Less, 21-100 Feet, 101-500 Feet, 501 Feet - 1 Mile, Over 1 Mile, Unknown
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Appeared as a dimensional copy of existing object

content.detailedDescription: I was walking outside in the morning time and for the third time that i have been outside i happen to see 2 orange yellowish glowing like disk shaped ufos watching me as i was observing it felt excited and full of energy i ask my fiance to come out and see it she asked me to come inside but i wouldn't i asked her to get my phone so i could video tape it before she could ever get back out it seemed like she forgot so i was left without being able to video tape it i was scared to leave it was so beautiful so i watch them leave one left out first it come back down like it was just telling the other it's time to go and then both of them ended up going up in the air is stopped and then both of them decided to just leave on their own fast speed then it disappeared in the blue skyi've never told anyone so nothing has been done with the land or checked for anything but i know where they were thank you i have captured many other pictures and videos i have too many more so if you wish for me to be able to send them to you contact me you have my number own video video on picture number 4 i have no recognition where it was took so look at the pictures through the screen looking at me they look like spirits facesthat color is olive green like military i don't know where was it i would like to have some closure to this
content.summary: I walked outside in the back of the house i'm always looking at night time and taking videos i have a lot of videos of things i've never seen they are very lit up i took a i have a lot of pictures if yo you have no idea of some of the things i had to show

content.detailedDescription: camping east of saint johns, az on private land less than a mile from the nm border. we had been looking at the iss, venus, mars, and shooting stars. when one of the campers said what is that and pointed to the sw sky. i observed two objects a few miles off, one being about 5x larger than mars and one about the size of venus. both had a constant white light under them with no flashing lights the larger appeared to have a small light on top of it . climbing at about a 45 degree angle 2-3x faster than the iss crossing the sky. both heading north with about a 10 degree difference in direction from one another. i told the other campers they just saw some serious government classified stuff right there. as they climbed out of our atmosphere til they became as small as the stars and faded out. 5 seconds after i lost sight one of the craft became visible again and changed from a northern direction to a eastern direction. 20 seconds after the incident i pointed out all of the planes (about 5) i could see just to show them that's not what they saw. they all agreed it wasn't a plane. as well as pointed out that mars was the largest thing in the sky other than the moon and what we saw started out larger than mars. i also pointed out it was a lot faster than the iss we had seen a few time over the weekend.
content.summary: 2 objects one smaller than the other

content.detailedDescription:
Admin, please add this additional file to the witness submission data for case 65946, waterford, mi

this is a video that contains a slow motion view of one of the objects flying over my house. it is illuminated at the end of an ir laser beam. if it was a bug or bird, it would be partially up the beam. if it was a satellite, it would be past the end of the beam and illumination from such a small device would be impossible. furthermore, it is inconceivable that there was a 'train' of 78+ birds and/or bugs following each other only a few seconds apart, all along the same path.
the speed of a satellite can be compared at the end of the newly attached video. i included 3 satellites (actually 4 - the 3rd contains one of the few pairs of satellites that is currently in orbit.) as can be seen in the video, all satellites appear to be travelling at roughly the same speed. the objects in the initial video traverse the visible sky at least 20 times faster - which by itself, excludes satellites from the list of standard possibilities.
one thing that always comes to mind when i hear someone asking for a 'reasonable explanation.' 'reasonable' has come to mean "from this particular box of accepted explanations." if your only goal is to dismiss everything regardless of the truth, then that 'box' is where all of your answers lie. if you are willing to accept the truth, as long as it is really the truth, sometimes lies outside that box and does in fact, include the reality that some of what we see did not originate from this world. (yes, i did say "fact!" also, the 'fact' that not every scientist in the world has agreed, does not make it not a fact. it just means the scientific community has a lot of catching up to do) they are out there, and the truth is coming out. like it or not, nobody will be able to cover that up for much longer. the time of threats and ridicule has passed.
content.summary: Supplemental information to case 65946, 80 ufos in 2 hours

content.detailedDescription: A friend and i were outside playing when we saw what we thought was an airplane until it stopped midair and came down. it landed on a road that led to a landfill we used to take trash. we stood and watched it change color for 30 minutes or more. we decided to ride our bikes to check out what it was but about the time we got close i looked back and my friend had turned back so i did also. we didn't see it leave it just stopped glowing. i regret not going to see what it was. that night started my fascination with ufo's. i haven't spoken to my friend at the time about it since.
content.summary: Observed oval light in sky that stopped then descended on a road nearby.

content.detailedDescription:
I was at outside ihop restaurant with my camcorder waiting for ufos to show up.  none did, and before packing away my camera i decided to zoom on a distant light that was behind some trees.  it turned out i saw in my lcd panel perfectly round bubbles after moving my camera to the right.  first i saw about 7 of them separate then i saw 4 or 5 in a round cluster that were fit into each other by half.  the bottom bubble pulsated on it bottom every second.  the clustered bubbles moved around similar to pictures of a baby in a womb.  i related it to being some kind of dna.  it was in a planter about 80 feet from me, and right next to it was a irregular dome shaped white object about a foot and a half wide.  it was blindingly bright, and it flared out bright light like a solar flare.  the bubble on the bottom of the cluster acted the same way only it was a blue green color.  i do not remember looking at it without the camera, and i do not know why i did not see it without my camera.  i would think the whole thing was my camera defaulting or something, but the film surely eliminates that possibility.  i know there is nothing wrong with my camera.  and i know it is not flood lights.  thomas

p.S. i heard on cable years ago that extraterrestrials are doing something to our environment related to genes.
content.summary: Could it be my camera?

content.detailedDescription:
My partner and i were talking in our car in our driveway (without our cellphones or camera) when a bright light appearing above the trees facing west caught our attention.  it was out of any aerial path and aside from that had a bright orange and red 'light' which is unusual for helicopters in our area.

we both agreed it was not a helicopter.  it became more apparent it was not a helicopter when it continued its ascent and proceeded to head east.  it then turned toward the north where we could see it was only a bright orange-red light, no other 'parts'.  it continued only about several hundred feet when it got smaller and smaller and seemed to disappear or disintegrate with no sound or parts exploding.

could it have been a type of firework (now that i'm thinking of it)?  it would be unlike any firework i've seen as this was big, bright, moved slowly with no culmination.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Bright orange-red light not in aerial path which ascended from the west then slowly changed paths going nw, hovered then became smaller and disappeared/disintegrated.

content.detailedDescription: Driving north on i-25 towards fort collins, colorado i noticed a triangular flash in the sky that lasted about 3 seconds, then flashed again about every 5 seconds.  as i got closer, i noticed that there were about 10 wedge shaped objects, white in color with black tips.  the flashing i saw was the sun bouncing off the objects as they banked left and right, in sync with each other!  i was close enough to confirm that these were not birds - they were much to large to be birds.  i estimate each object to have a wing span of about 10 feet.  they were flying in a wedge formation and banking left and right.  they appeared to have forward facing wings.  what caught my eye was the in sync nature of their flight path - they all banked at the exact same time.  i lost sight of the objects as i drove north on the freeway.  the objects were flying out of the northwest and flying towards the southeast.  i also noticed a single engine prop aircraft flying in a circle just prior to seeing the objects.  the aircraft was flying around the objects, basically keeping them in the center of the circle.  i can provide a sketch if you would like.  in addition, these are the same objects shown in a video filmed in 2013.  can provide a link if requested.
content.summary: 10 to 12 wedge shaped objects flying and banking in sync with each other - white with black tips - positive these are not birds

content.detailedDescription:
[link moved to fi section/cms/tg]

this was not taken by me, but  by a fellow st. louisian.  it is posted on you tube. see link above. listed on you tube as "[youtube title moved to fi section/cms/tg]" by fox 2 news
content.summary: Lights in sky

content.detailedDescription:
We have a bushnell hd  model 119477 camera which we leave outdoors to film wildlife.  the camera is left unattended at all times.

when the event was recorded we were asleep in our house so no one witnessed this.  this was caught on the above camera.

we are interested to know what this light was.  we have checked the camera lens and couldn't see any dots on the surface of the lens.

the camera has been used for the past two years in the same location and this is the only sighting of this kind that we have recorded.
content.summary: Moving round glowing object like an orb.

content.detailedDescription: Was at home looking out my bedroom window about 10:50. i noticed a bright light moving but was no flashing lights i thought was a star but was larger than the others stars. as i watched it as moved southwest  it got dimmer and then brighter as went behind the trees i couldn't see it for about two minutes.During the two minutes was out my sight i seen a air plain flying the same path. then the ufo appears moving towards me over tree line this time it was coming  directly over me as i watched it i seen the light fizzled out . the light went from bigger than star to about size of a cigarette amber then  it just disappear. i then noticed another air plain about two min after the light disappear.
content.summary: Strange big bright light above stephenville texas

content.detailedDescription: Curved light going down sort of flashed greenish blue. daughter witnessed. driving home from mall. bright light. a falling star. falling curving down and bright with a tail. excitement. disappeaed when it fell
content.summary: Curved light going down sort of flashed greenish blue

content.detailedDescription: At night on my back patio while talking with my wife on the phone i observed a strange looking orange/white glowing object moving northeast like an aircraft, but then stopped. to get on video i hung up the phone and went to the front of the house to get a video. it then proceeded east at a crawling speed until out of site. no noise, and not a regular aircraft or chopper for sure that i regularly see with the navy air base close by.
content.summary: Abnormal aircraft/object

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in the kitchen signing thank you cards and looked at the front door for no reason. i saw a shadow on the front porch pillar so i got up to go look. nothing was there. it must have been the bush. but then lightning flashed and i looked up in the sky. behold the ufo! all along i thought it was a ufo and nothing less. it was shaped like a triangle and had bright lights on all three corners. on the two sides the lights went across the whole object. there were no lights on the back, the other side, but there was a bright light in the center of the object. i couldn't tell how many lights there were, but there was at least the main four. all i saw was it moving across the sky going south south west. i felt excited when i saw it! it was the second time i've seen a ufo. i lost sight of it because it flew out of sight in my window.
content.summary: Flew across the sky

content.detailedDescription: Lying in bed watching old tosh.0 replay, heard a loud (my computer was loud, heard it over computer) air vehicle, slow hovering moving sound, shut off vid, grabbed cell, took two pics as flying away (one thru screen, horrible, other, not blocked, but far away) with galaxy note 4. then watched as it turned back, and slowly headed this way, took about 1 minute video, sound near end, then i lost it as it passed house. will post pics later, still a little shocked
content.summary: Bright light went away, then flew back

content.detailedDescription: I was looking out my window when i was 5 or so and i just saw these 3 glowing lights in the sky multi-colored, and in a disk like shape, it seemed to go diagonal downward as if it were landing. i didn't know what to do, but a little bit after i watched the sight  i went to get my mom, but when we got there, it disappeared. i knew this was a ufo because and not a plane because there wasn't any air force bases or airports nearby.
content.summary: Several separate glowing lights  close together

content.detailedDescription: back yard. looked up. a plane then it moved up side to side then up
content.summary: Light in the sky moving from side to side than up then back to center then up side  to side

content.detailedDescription: I was driving at the time going to a friends house restless huge ball of flame like plasma or what i would say looks huge it was probably tennis ball size from where i saw the object.This was not the first time i had seen a plasma ball the very first occurrence was actually in my backyard where i saw it very up close it came through the trees and went and went into the sky in the clouds and let the clouds up and then disappeared.This ball of plasma did almost exactly that except went into the sky and just disappeared after it hit a certain elevation.
content.summary: Big orange flame like ball that i saw in the northeast sky near 7 highway south bound

content.detailedDescription: Around 3:30 i stepped outside of my garage for a breather from the project i was working on. i looked up and saw unnatural cloud formations resulting from geoengineering that had been occurring that day. as an activist against these crimes against humanity, i always make sure to document and share the evidence of these operations. as i was documenting these insidious looking fake clouds, i noticed a perfectly circular white orb hovering way up in the atmosphere in the midst of the fake clouds. i had never seen anything like it so i kept staring. it was slowly moving west, in very methodical, controlled, and smooth movements. it would come to a complete stop for minutes at a time-then start slowly moving west again methodically. in my opinion it was being intelligently controlled. it was not a balloon just blowing around on it's own, being controlled by the wind. this thing would remain completely stationary for a while, then start moving again. i was able to get a lot of video footage of it because of how still it was remaining. my son witnessed it, my neighbor witnessed it, and even when i went to pick up my car from my mechanic, he noticed it too. so i personally met with 3 people besides myself who can confirm this sighting. when i posted these videos on social media, many others commented not only from my county saying they had seen it too, but others from around the state (san jose, long beach, riverside,) said they had seen it recently too. it had no sound, no sudden movements, it didn't disappear or dematerialize, it just hovered high up in the atmosphere for about 4.5 hours. around 7:00 i began filming again after taking an hour off to go to the mechanic. when i had started filming again, it had made its way west towards the sun, so it was on the other side of the sky. a bunch more artificial aerosol clouds started blowing in from the ocean again around 7:30, and it was at that point that i lost sight of the object within those white "cloud" formations. i can send you the links to the videos that i took and then posted to youtube.
content.summary: I witnessed what looked like a perfectly white circle hovering in the sky for about 4.5 hours.
